alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Franklin; Greene; Madison; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:28PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN, NORTHERN FAYETTE, NORTHWESTERN PICKAWAY, EAST CENTRAL GREENE AND SOUTHERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1027 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from West Jefferson to 6 miles south of London to near South Charleston, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph, pea size hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Grove City, London, Jefferson, Groveport, West Jefferson, Ashville, Mount Sterling, South Bloomfield, Commercial Point, Lithopolis, Lafayette, South Solon, Midway, Harrisburg, Orient, Lockbourne, Darbyville, Newport and Deer Creek Lake. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 76 and 80. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 72 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
